trigger.Name: CreateKey

trigger.Name: RotateKey
trigger.script: local k = getObj("sword") local zq = Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1) if GetVar("RotateKey").AsInt==0 then zq:RotY(RAD(0.2)) else zq:RotY(RAD(1.2)) end if k then local rot = k:GetRotation() k:SetRotation(zq*rot) end

trigger.Name: RemoveKey

trigger.Name: SwordUp
trigger.script:
local sw = getObj("sword") local swCoor = sw:GetPosition() swCoor.y = swCoor.y + 0.015 sw:SetPosition(swCoor)
TActivate("DeaSword_Y")

trigger.Name: SwordDown
trigger.script:
local sw = getObj("sword") local swCoor = sw:GetPosition() swCoor.y = swCoor.y - 0.015 sw:SetPosition(swCoor)

trigger.Name: Start_YesOrNot
trigger.script:
local s
if GetVar("ChallengeComplete").AsInt==1 then s = 4 else s = 1 end
local b = SpawnMessageBox(s) if b == 1 then TActivate("CreateGate") TActivate("ActivateKey") TActivate("StartChallenge") trigger:Deactivate() end

trigger.Name: StartChallenge
trigger.script:
SetVar("Score", 0) SetVar("ScoreUP", 50)
AddImportantFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_start_challenge")
local randMusic = random(2) PlayCustomMusic ("sumeru_battle_"..randMusic)
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() if Plf then Plf:AddModifier( "hp", "+ 10000" ) Plf:setImmortalMode(1) CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_S_DUNGEON_START", PlfCoor, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true) end
TActivate("ChallengeFaze2") TActivate("TimerStart") TActivate("IfPlayerWithoutHP")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: ChallengeFaze2
trigger.script:
local l = GetVar("Score").AsInt
local RandomLoc = "" local RandomLocList = {"SpawnEnemy1_loc", "SpawnEnemy2_loc", "SpawnEnemy3_loc", "SpawnEnemy4_loc"}
if l == 0 then RandomLoc = 1 else RandomLoc = random(4) end
local Rotate = "" local RandomCarList = "" local RandomCar = ""
if RandomLoc == 1 then Rotate = Quaternion(0.007, 0.711, 0.007, -0.703) elseif RandomLoc == 2 then Rotate = Quaternion(0.000, 1.000, 0.009, 0.011) elseif RandomLoc == 3 then Rotate = Quaternion(0.009, 0.008, -0.000, -1.000) elseif RandomLoc == 4 then Rotate = Quaternion(0.007, -0.701, -0.007, -0.713) end
if (150 >= l) then RandomCarList = {"Sml101", "Sml201", "Sml301", "Sml401"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 10) elseif (l >= 2000) then RandomCarList = {"Dozer01", "Tank01", "Mirotvorec01", "Mirotvorec2", "Mirotvorec3", "Mirotvorec4", "Mirotvorec5", "Cruiser01", "Cruiser02", "Belaz01", "Belaz2", "Belaz3", "Belaz4", "Belaz5"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 200) elseif (l >= 1700) then RandomCarList = {"Mirotvorec01", "Mirotvorec2", "Mirotvorec3", "Mirotvorec4", "Mirotvorec5", "Cruiser01", "Cruiser02"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 150) elseif (l >= 1500) then RandomCarList = {"Belaz01", "Belaz2", "Belaz3", "Belaz4", "Belaz5"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 125) elseif (l >= 1200) then RandomCarList = {"Ural00", "Ural01", "Ural3", "Ural4", "Ural5", "Ural02"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 100) elseif (l >= 1000) then RandomCarList = {"r1m1_molokovoz02", "r2m1_Molokovoz01", "r2m2_Molokovoz01", "r1m1_molokovoz01", "r1m1_molokovoz03"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) elseif (l >= 800) then RandomCarList = {"r1m3_molokovoz03", "r1m1_molokovoz01", "r1m1_molokovoz02", "r1m1_bug02", "r1m1_bug03", "DemoBug2"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 75) elseif (l >= 550) then RandomCarList = {"Bug01", "r1m1_bug02", "r1m1_bug03", "DemoBug2", "DemoBug3", "Fighter01", "Fighter02", "Hunter02"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 50) elseif (l >= 300) then RandomCarList = {"Scout01", "Scout02", "Scout03", "Fighter01", "Fighter02", "Hunter02"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 30) elseif (l >= 150) then RandomCarList = {"Sml101", "Sml201", "Sml301", "Sml401", "Scout01", "Scout02", "Scout03", "Fighter01"} RandomCar = getn(RandomCarList) SetVar("ScoreUP", 15) end
local randCar = "" local Car = ""
if l >= 800 then randCar = random(2) elseif l >= 550 then randCar = random(3) else randCar = random(2,4) end
if randCar == 1 then Car = {RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)]} elseif randCar == 2 then Car = {RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)], RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)]} elseif randCar == 3 then Car = {RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)], RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)], RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)]} elseif randCar == 4 then Car = {RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)], RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)], RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)], RandomCarList[exrandom(RandomCar)]} end
TeamCreate("Enemy2", 1002, CVector(getPos(RandomLocList[RandomLoc])), Car, nil, 0, Rotate)
local smallgun={"hornet01","specter01","pkt01","storm01","kord01"} local smallgunRand = getn(smallgun) local biggun={"rapier01","vector01","vulcan01","kpvt01","bumblebee01","rainmetal01","flag01","omega01","elephant01","odin01","hurricane01"} local biggunRand = getn(biggun)
local giantgun = {""} local sidegun = {""}
if l > 2000 then sidegun={"marsSideGun","zeusSideGun","hunterSideGun"} giantgun={"cyclops01","octopus01","rocketLauncher","big_swingfire01"} elseif l > 1500 then giantgun={"cyclops01","octopus01","rocketLauncher","big_swingfire01"} else giantgun={"cyclops01","octopus01"} end
local giantgunRand = getn(giantgun) local sidegunRand = getn(sidegun)
local forI = randCar - 1
for i=0,forI do local Enemy = GetEntityByName ("Enemy2_vehicle_"..i) local EnCoor = Enemy:GetPosition() if Enemy then Enemy:setImmortalMode(1) CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_PS_DRONE_EX_D", EnCoor, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true) end TActivate("Enemy"..i.."_DeadFaze2") GunsForEnemy(Enemy, smallgun[exrandom(smallgunRand)], biggun[exrandom(biggunRand)], giantgun[exrandom(giantgunRand)], sidegun[exrandom(sidegunRand)]) end
TActivate("EnemyFaze2_AllDead")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: Enemy0_DeadFaze2
trigger.script:
local EnemyQ1 = GetEntityByName ("Enemy2_vehicle_0") local EnCoor1 = EnemyQ1:GetPosition() if EnemyQ1 then CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_PS_VEH_EXP2_MED1", EnCoor1, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true) EnemyQ1:Remove() end
local sc = GetVar("ScoreUP").AsInt local l = GetVar("Score").AsInt local c = GetVar("Combo").AsInt
c = c + 1
if c >= 2 then sc = sc * c end
l = l + sc
AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_challenge_score", l, sc) SetVar("Score",l)
if c >= 4 then SetVar("Combo", 0) else SetVar("Combo", c) end
if c >= 2 then AddImportantFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_challenge_kill_"..c) end
TActivate("DEA_EnemyDestrouedCOMBO") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: EnemyFaze2_AllDead
trigger.script: if getObj("Enemy0_DeadFaze2"):IsActivated()==0 and getObj("Enemy1_DeadFaze2"):IsActivated()==0 and getObj("Enemy2_DeadFaze2"):IsActivated()==0 and getObj("Enemy3_DeadFaze2"):IsActivated()==0 then TActivate("ChallengeFaze2") trigger:Deactivate() end

trigger.Name: EnemyDestrouedCOMBO
trigger.script:
local t = GetVar("ComboTimer").AsInt
if t == 0 then SetVar("Combo", 0) SetVar("ComboTimer", 0) trigger:Deactivate() else t = t - 1 SetVar("ComboTimer", t) end

trigger.Name: DEA_EnemyDestrouedCOMBO
trigger.script: SetVar("ComboTimer", 3) if getObj("EnemyDestrouedCOMBO"):IsActivated()==0 then TActivate("EnemyDestrouedCOMBO") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: RemoveEnemys
trigger.script:
if getObj("Enemy0_DeadFaze2"):IsActivated()==1 then local Enemy = GetEntityByName ("Enemy2_vehicle_0") local EnCoor = Enemy:GetPosition() if Enemy then CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_PS_DRONE_EX_D", EnCoor, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true) Enemy:Remove() end end
if getObj("Enemy1_DeadFaze2"):IsActivated()==1 then local Enemy2 = GetEntityByName ("Enemy2_vehicle_1") local EnCoor2 = Enemy2:GetPosition() if Enemy2 then CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_PS_DRONE_EX_D", EnCoor2, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true) Enemy2:Remove() end end
if getObj("Enemy2_DeadFaze2"):IsActivated()==1 then local Enemy3 = GetEntityByName ("Enemy2_vehicle_2") local EnCoor3 = Enemy3:GetPosition() if Enemy3 then CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_PS_DRONE_EX_D", EnCoor3, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true) Enemy3:Remove() end end
if getObj("Enemy3_DeadFaze2"):IsActivated()==1 then local Enemy4 = GetEntityByName ("Enemy2_vehicle_3") local EnCoor4 = Enemy4:GetPosition() if Enemy4 then CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_PS_DRONE_EX_D", EnCoor4, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true) Enemy4:Remove() end end
for i=0,3 do TDeactivate("Enemy"..i.."_DeadFaze2") end
TDeactivate("EnemyFaze2_AllDead")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: TimerStart
trigger.script: local t = GetVar("TimerMain").AsInt SetVar("Timer", t) if getObj("Timer"):IsActivated()==0 then TActivate("Timer") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: Timer
trigger.script:
local t = GetVar("Timer").AsInt
if t == 250 or t == 180 or t == 120 or t == 60 or t == 30 or t == 10 or 6 > t and not(t == 0) then AddImportantFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_dungeon_timer", t) end
if t == 0 then SetVar("Timer", 0) TActivate("ChallengeComplete") trigger:Deactivate() else t = t - 1 SetVar("Timer", t) end

trigger.Name: ChallengeComplete
trigger.script:
local l = GetVar("Score").AsInt
SetVar("ChallengeComplete", 1)
if GetVar("PlayerDie").AsInt == 1 then AddImportantFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_done_challenge") SetVar("PlayerDie", 0) else AddImportantFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_complete_challenge") TActivate("RemoveEnemys") TActivate("RemoveKeyUnActive") end
AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_challenge_your_score", l)
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() if Plf then Plf:AddModifier( "hp", "+ 10000" ) Plf:setImmortalMode(0) CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_S_DUNGEON_COMPLETE_CHALLENGE", PlfCoor, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true) end
TActivate("Start_YesOrNot") TActivate("RemoveGate") TActivate("YourRecord")
TDeactivate("TimerStart") TDeactivate("Timer")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: YourRecord
trigger.script:
local l = GetVar("Score").AsInt local p = GetVar("PermanentScore").AsInt
if GetVar("Score").AsInt > p then SetVar("PermanentScore", l) end
AddImportantFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_challenge_your_record", GetVar("PermanentScore").AsInt) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: IfPlayerWithoutHP
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfHP = GetPlayerHealth()
if Plf then if PlfHP == 0 then SetVar("PlayerDie",1) TDeactivate("TimerStart") TDeactivate("Timer") TActivate("ChallengeComplete") TActivate("RemoveEnemys") TActivate("RemoveKeyUnActive") trigger:Deactivate() end end
